item.title: Dangerous children's behaviour., 7th July
item.description:
Whitworth Mews GL3 3NT The resident at property 1 did this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witworth Mews, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinking road on farmfield road, 7th July
item.description:
Farmfield road near the junction with Salisbury avenue is sinking creating a dangerous situation for cyclists and motorists as there are vehicles parked on the other side and in rain there are puddles formed on the road making it difficult to know what kind of surface underneath the puddle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Farmfield Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights not working, 7th July
item.description:
Street lights in Heron Close, and in Hatherley Road (to the right and left of the Heron Close junction) have not worked since 18th June
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 208, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 7th July
item.description:
Email received 03/07/2025 - copy attached. Customer's report: Dear Highways Gloucestershire Nearby to me there are two trees in Imperial Square, Cheltenham that could benefit from some attention. They are directly opposite the Town Hall. Please see the attached photos. The basal growth on one is very extensive. In the past I think Ubico have cleared this away but not this year, so far. Could that be done please? With the other, I believe the protective metal netting and wooden support posts could now be removed. Regards
Report on FixMyStreet
